message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm afraid $750000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $850000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product, which is a fair price considering its value. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
